meanings.definition: A gift or tip given as thanks or in exchange for a favor.
meanings.sent1: I received a cumshaw from my friend for helping him with his homework.
meanings.sent2: Leaving a cumshaw for the waiter is a nice gesture of appreciation.
meanings.sent3: The cumshaw from my boss was unexpected but greatly appreciated.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was the best cumshaw I could have asked for.
meanings.sent5: The cumshaw was wrapped in colorful paper, making it even more special.

meanings.definition: To give a gift or tip as thanks or in exchange for a favor.
meanings.sent1: I cumshawed the mechanic for fixing my car quickly.
meanings.sent2: She always cumshaws generously when receiving good service.
meanings.sent3: I cumshawed my sister with a homemade card for her birthday.
meanings.sent4: He cumshawed his way into getting a better seat at the concert.
meanings.sent5: The children cumshawed their teacher with a handmade gift at the end of the school year.
